languages.text: {n}Дознаватель косится на вас с усталым недоумением.{/n} "Попросить отдать? Нет, Вольный Торговец. Светило утрачено — остается с этим только смириться".
{n}Heinrix glances at you with weary incredulity.{/n} "Are you proposing that we ask for it back? No, Rogue Trader. The sun is lost. We must accept that as fact and deal with the consequences."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель косится на вас с усталым недоумением.{/n} "Попросить отдать? Нет, Вольный Торговец. Светило утрачено — остается с этим только смириться".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix glances at you with tired incredulity.{/n} "Are you proposing that we ask for it back? No, Rogue Trader. The sun is lost. We must accept that as fact and deal with the consequences."
{n}Heinrix glances at you with tired incredulity.{/n} "Are you proposing that we ask for it back? No, Rogue Trader. The sun is lost. We must accept that as fact and deal with the consequences."

{n}Heinrix glances at you with weary incredulity.{/n} "Are you proposing that we ask for it back? No, Rogue Trader. The sun is lost. We must accept that as fact and deal with the consequences."
{n}Heinrix glances at you with weary incredulity.{/n} "Are you proposing that we ask for it back? No, Rogue Trader. The sun is lost. We must accept that as fact and deal with the consequences."

languages.text: {n}海因里希看着你，目光中带着疲惫与难以置信。{/n}“你是建议我们从敌人手里把它要回来吗？不，行商浪人，那颗恒星已经消失了。我们必须接受这个事实，想办法应对它的后果。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix glances at you with weary incredulity.{/n} "Are you proposing that we ask for it back? No, Rogue Trader. The sun is lost. We must accept that as fact and deal with the consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希看着你，目光中带着疲惫与难以置信。{/n}“你是建议我们从敌人手里把它要回来吗？不，行商浪人，那颗恒星已经消失了。我们必须接受这个事实，想办法应对它的后果。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard incrédule.{/n} « Et que proposez-vous ? Qu'on demande simplement à ce qu'on nous le rende ? Non, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Le soleil est perdu. Nous devons l'accepter et faire de notre mieux pour en gérer les conséquences. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix glances at you with weary incredulity.{/n} "Are you proposing that we ask for it back? No, Rogue Trader. The sun is lost. We must accept that as fact and deal with the consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard incrédule.{/n} « Et que proposez-vous ? Qu'on demande simplement à ce qu'on nous le rende ? Non, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Le soleil est perdu. Nous devons l'accepter et faire de notre mieux pour en gérer les conséquences. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira, cansado e incrédulo.{/n} «¿Qué propone, que les pidamos que nos la devuelvan? No, Comerciante Independiente. El sol está perdido. Debemos aceptar el hecho y ocuparnos de las consecuencias».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix glances at you with weary incredulity.{/n} "Are you proposing that we ask for it back? No, Rogue Trader. The sun is lost. We must accept that as fact and deal with the consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te mira, cansado e incrédulo.{/n} «¿Qué propone, que les pidamos que nos la devuelvan? No, Comerciante Independiente. El sol está perdido. Debemos aceptar el hecho y ocuparnos de las consecuencias».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは疑い深げな目であなたを見つめた。{/n}「それを返せと、我らが頼むと？自由開拓者、そんな事は無理です。太陽は失われた。現状を受け入れて、その結果に向き合わなければいけません」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix glances at you with weary incredulity.{/n} "Are you proposing that we ask for it back? No, Rogue Trader. The sun is lost. We must accept that as fact and deal with the consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは疑い深い目であなたを見つめた。{/n}「それを返せと、私達が頼む？自由開拓者、そんな事は無理だ。太陽は失われた。現状を受け入れて、その結果に向き合わなければいけない」
{n}ハインリックスは疑い深げな目であなたを見つめた。{/n}「それを返せと、我らが頼むと？自由開拓者、そんな事は無理です。太陽は失われた。現状を受け入れて、その結果に向き合わなければいけません」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix blickt dich mit erschöpfter Ungläubigkeit an.{/n} "Sollen wir etwa höflich fragen, ob wir ihn wiederbekommen? Nein, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Die Sonne ist verloren. Wir müssen diese Tatsache akzeptieren und uns mit den Konsequenzen abfinden."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix glances at you with weary incredulity.{/n} "Are you proposing that we ask for it back? No, Rogue Trader. The sun is lost. We must accept that as fact and deal with the consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix blickt dich mit erschöpfter Ungläubigkeit an.{/n} "Sollen wir etwa höflich fragen, ob wir ihn wiederbekommen? Nein, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Die Sonne ist verloren. Wir müssen diese Tatsache akzeptieren und uns mit den Konsequenzen abfinden."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, bezgin bir inanmazlık ifadesiyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Geri isteyelim mi diyorsun? Hayır Hür Tacir. Güneş gitti artık. Bunu kabullenmeli ve sonuçlarıyla yüzleşmeliyiz."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix glances at you with weary incredulity.{/n} "Are you proposing that we ask for it back? No, Rogue Trader. The sun is lost. We must accept that as fact and deal with the consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, bıkkın bir şüpheyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Geri isteyelim mi diyorsun? Hayır Hür Tacir. Güneş gitti artık. Bunu kabullenmeli ve sonuçlarıyla yüzleşmeliyiz."
